price: Dájúdájú A ṣe al-Ƙur’ān ní ìrọ̀rùn fún ṣíṣe ìrántí. Ǹjẹ́ olùrántí wà báyìí bí?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
